name: Tower Wars (2 Player)
description:
Description:

This is a 2 player game that involves one player using WASD and one using the arrow keys. Fight your opponent and shield yourself from attacks to the best of your ability and defeat your enemy. Why not give it a try? It is free after all!

Two players required! (Unless you want to verse yourself) 

Coming soon:

- Improved sound effects

- More background music

PLEASE COMMENT YOUR IDEAS / REQUESTS
